attributes.action: Stop all schools in the U.K. giving homeworks to pupils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to waste our own time at home doing homeworks? The time that is wasted could be spent on better things! Play, fun and sports are vital in the lives of children and teenager! Homeworks are making Teenagers and even TEACHERS stressed. Most teachers are becoming more fed up with having to mark so many homeworks and Teenagers are becoming more fed up with doing the homeworks which can lead to drugs!
